## 2026-02-09

### 🚀 Updated Scripts

  - AdGuard Home: auto-select platform download based on container architecture
  - Alpine AdGuard Home: auto-select platform download based on container architecture
  - Alpine Caddy: use arch-specific xcaddy download; skip prompt when non-interactive
  - Alpine Docker: use arch-specific Docker Compose download; skip prompts when non-interactive
  - Alpine bitmagnet: skip TMDB prompt when non-interactive
  - Alpine Garage: auto-select release download by architecture
